item.title: Bright Green Corp S-1
item.description: Bright Green Corp, which is in the Medicinal Chemicals & Botanical Products [2833] industry, SEC S-1 filing on September 22, 2022 had 41142 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 562 instances stock - 499 instances cannabis - 452 instances common - 424 instances may - 413 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
